name: jqueryminesweeper
description: A simple minesweeper built with jquery
author: Alexander Edvinsson

scripts.build: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/index.css dist/index.css && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
scripts.build:prod: webpack -p && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && src/index.css dist/index.css
